channel.title: Docs on SkuyJS
channel.description: Recent content in Docs on SkuyJS

item.title: Getting Started
item.description: This is basic usage of SkuyJS. const Server = require('@skuyjs/http-server'); const server = new Server(); server.get('/', (req, res) => { res.send('hello'); }); server.listen(8080);

item.title: Quick Start
item.description: this is quick start #this-is-quick-start { color: #494d55; } #this-is-quick-start:hover { text-decoration: none; }
